Interface CafeteriaService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CafeteriaServiceImpl
public interface CafeteriaService
CafeteriaService is a service interface that defines core operations for managing cafeterias in the system.

It provides standard CRUD functionality as well as specific operations such as updating review-related fields (e.g., rating and review count).

Exceptions such as BadRequestException and NotFoundException are used to signal input validation errors or missing resources respectively.

  • Method Details

    • createCafeteria

      CafeteriaDTO createCafeteria(CafeteriaDTO cafeteriaDTO) throws BadRequestException
      Creates a new cafeteria with the provided data.
      Parameters:
      cafeteriaDTO - The data of the cafeteria to be created.
      Returns:
      The newly created CafeteriaDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if input validation fails.

    • getCafeteriaById

      CafeteriaDTO getCafeteriaById(Long id) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves a cafeteria by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the cafeteria.
      Returns:
      The corresponding CafeteriaDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no cafeteria with the given ID exists.
      BadRequestException - if the ID is invalid.

    • getAllCafeterias

      List<CafeteriaDTO> getAllCafeterias() throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves all cafeterias from the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all CafeteriaDTO instances.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no cafeterias are found.
      BadRequestException - if the request is malformed.

    • updateCafeteria

      CafeteriaDTO updateCafeteria(Long id, CafeteriaDTO cafeteriaDTO) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Updates an existing cafeteria with new data.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the cafeteria to update.
      cafeteriaDTO - The updated data for the cafeteria.
      Returns:
      The updated CafeteriaDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the cafeteria is not found.
      BadRequestException - if the provided data is invalid.

    • updateCafeteriaReviewFields

      CafeteriaDTO updateCafeteriaReviewFields(Long cafeteriaId, Integer countReviews, Double rating) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Updates the review-related fields (review count and rating) for a cafeteria.
      Parameters:
      cafeteriaId - The ID of the cafeteria to update.
      countReviews - The new total number of reviews.
      rating - The updated average rating.
      Returns:
      The updated CafeteriaDTO.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if input is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if the cafeteria is not found.
